full_output.summary: Executive with background in corporate human resources. Highly skilled handling hiring and maintenance of HR records. Dependable HR professional with extensive experience in planning, directing and coordinating HR policies. Manages administration of employee compensation and employee benefits.

experiences.description: Recruitment Coordination with Technical panel and understanding their requirements, defining job positions Resourcing, screening and short listing resumes through various job portals or else internal reference, head hunting Short listing the resumes based on desired skills and experience Preparing offer letter, employment contract and job descriptions, completing joining Formalities and documentation HR Administration Knowledge in end to end payroll work Knowledge of Payroll software like GreytHR Managing ESIC / EPF Compliances for PAN India Genaration of PF and ESI numbers for new hires Uploading monthly PF and ESI challan on time Preparing and keeping record of Challans & various reports like PF, ESIC Preparing Final settlements, Gratuity, leave salary and all employee benefits Compilation & processing of attendance data in attendance system Processing monthly attendance musters for employees Maintaining employee s personal files and records, Tracking attendance, maintaining leave records, PF records, issue letters, etc Preparation of full and final settlement generation of Experience Letters, Relieving Letters Keeping track of Confirmation, Appraisals, and Increments of employees Preparing various letters like offer letter, appointment letter, confirmation letter, increment letter Monitoring housekeeping staff general admin work.

Receive approved attendance from clients Raising invoice for provided service as per attendance Responsible for managing payroll operations Processing Payroll accurate and error free Processing salary on time for all employees PF and ESI number generation and uploading challan monthly Sending compliance documents to clients every month Issuing Payslip and ESI cards to employees Issuing Disciplinary Orders Assist with Head- HR Preparing monthly attendance report Preparing MIS Employee (Attendance, Leave & OT records) in excel sheet. Present the employees performance report in front of HR manage Provided support to employees with various HR-related issues and liaised with heads of department to find resolutions.

full_output.name: Sushma M S
